attributes.action: UFO/Alien Disclosure - time for the truth.
attributes.additional_details:
For many years, the truth has been withheld from the general public - and now we the people, see no just cause for the continued secrecy behind this very real phenomena.

We, the undersigned - ask the British government to share with its citizens...the full truth that it knows - about UFO/Alien visitations to this planet by beings or probes not of this planet.
